title: Epigenetic patterns determine if honeybee larvae become queens or workers

title_detail.value: Epigenetic patterns determine if honeybee larvae become queens or workers

summary: Scientists have unraveled how changes in nutrition in the early development of honeybees can result in vastly different adult characteristics.

summary_detail.value: Scientists have unraveled how changes in nutrition in the early development of honeybees can result in vastly different adult characteristics.
